about_the_game:
Are you looking to have a fun time with your partner, friend, or family member on the couch? Bomball is made just for you!

You can also play Bomball online with a friend using Steam Remote Play!



Bomball is a 2D action, top-down shooter, local PvP (Player vs. Player) game. Players must shoot and juggle the ball (which is a bomb) toward the enemy's goal (which is their car). The first player to destroy the other player's car wins the match!

You can play Bomball against a friend locally on the same machine by connecting a controller or practice your skills solo with an AI in the training section.

Want more information about the game? Keep reading.

  • To get the adrenaline rush you're looking for, we recommend playing the game with a controller.
  • The game's dynamic physics create unique and exhilarating gameplay. If you love fast-paced, dynamic action, this game is for you.
  • Challenge yourself and your friends in three different gameplay modes, each adding an extra layer of chaos to the game.

Key features of the game:

  • The ball gets bigger over time until it explodes into two balls. You can risk scoring a goal when the ball is big for maximum destruction damage or score fast before disaster strikes your own goal.
  • Some crazy spectators from outside the playground will try to interfere with the match. Keep an eye on them!
  • The chaos from inside and outside the field will try to distract or stun you. Look out for explosions, electric balls, mortars, and other hazards that may stun you.
  • Avoid standing still near your car. The crowd is here to see action, and they won't like it if you act like a coward!


Join the action today and become a legend in the Bomball arena!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM with support for OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum of 1 gamepad controller is needed to play local multiplayer.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM with support for OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum of 1 gamepad controller is needed to play local multiplayer. 2 controllers are recommended for the best experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS 10.13.0+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GTX 775M or AMD Radeon 555 or Intel Iris Plus 655
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum of 1 gamepad controller is needed to play local multiplayer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OS 14.2.1+
  • Processor: Apple M2 or Intel Core M or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GTX 775M or AMD Radeon 555 or Intel Iris Plus 655 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum of 1 gamepad controller is needed to play local multiplayer. 2 controllers are recommended for the best experience.

short_description: Bomball is a thrilling 2D top-down shooter PvP game where players juggle a bomb-ball to score against their opponent's car. Play locally with friends or practice solo against AI. With dynamic physics and chaotic gameplay modes, every match is a fast-paced battle for victory!
